xml:
"Oh Justine" cried the weeping
Elizabeth, "forgive me for having for
one moment distrusted you – But
why didyou confess? But do not mourn
my dear girl, I will every where
proclaim your innocence and will
force belief. Yet you must die –
you my companion, my playfellow,
my more than sister— die –I never
never can survive so horrible
a misfortune".
